description: Japanese forward Kyosuke Tagawa will bring "some top quality squad depth" after completing a six-figure move to Hearts from FC Tokyo.
title: Kyosuke Tagawa: Hearts sign forward from Tokyo for undisclosed fee
title_page: Kyosuke Tagawa: Hearts sign forward from Tokyo for undisclosed fee - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Hearts is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
